Package nerot.task

Interface Summary
Primeable Tasks implementing the ability to run once at beginning of schedule and perhaps checking a few times to attempt for it to start correctly.
Task A Task that can be executed.
 

Class Summary
BaseTask A task that has a Store.
GenericTask A task that uses reflection to call an object generically and store the results in the Store.
HttpGetTask Performs an HTTP GET request.
RssTask Gets an RSS feed.
TaskRunner Has a Task and run() calls execute() on the Task.
